data.why:
I would like to learn how to create good modules and contribute
    modules and sripts pertaining to: - log file analysis (web server;
    game servers) - web tools (eg: eBay module to dl, extract & store
    your past auctions in a SQL db) - some day perhaps modules for an
    open source Perl mud I am helping to write currently. - I have seen
    some modules on Go (board game) on CPAN (Games::Go::) and would like
    to help expand this area, having written a rudimentary Go-client
    myself.
